references.paper_title: Enhancing presentation slide generation by LLMs with a multi-staged end-to-end approach
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel multi-staged end-to-end approach for generating presentation slides using LLMs, which is directly compared against in the current work.
This paper explores knowledge-centric templatic views for document processing, offering an alternative approach to presentation generation that is discussed and compared to in the current work.

references.paper_title: Mllm-as-a-judge: Assessing multimodal Ilm-as-a-judge with vision-language benchmark
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel evaluation framework using LLMs as judges for multimodal tasks, which is directly relevant to the evaluation methodology used in the current work.

references.paper_title: Doc2ppt: Automatic presentation slides generation from scientific documents
references.reason: This paper presents a method for automatically generating presentation slides from scientific documents, which is used as a baseline and compared to in the current work.

references.paper_title: A systematic survey and critical review on evaluating large language models: Challenges, limitations, and recommendations
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive review of existing large language model evaluation methods, which is directly relevant to the evaluation methodology presented in the current work.
